item.name: Delete key by typing E+I
item.autogen: __SimultaneousKeyPresses__ KeyCode::E, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::DELETE, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION

item.name: Arrow keys with Vim directions
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT

item.name: Remap F19 to Hyper
item.appendix: This maps F19 to Control + Shift + Option + Command.
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Hyper+C to open Chrome
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_CHROME,

item.name: Hyper+S to open Editor
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_APP_Editor,

item.name: Hyper+T to open iTerm
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_ITERM,

item.name: Hyper+A to open Slack
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_OPEN_URL_APP_Slack,

item.name: Hyper+F to open Line
Hyper+B to open Tweetbot

item.name: Hyper+Q to mission control
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Q, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::MISSION_CONTROL,

item.name: Hyper+H to left cursor
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT,

item.name: Hyper+J to down cursor
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN,

item.name: Hyper+K to up cursor
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP,

item.name: Hyper+L to right cursor
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT,

item.name: Hyper+U to left workspace
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::U, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Hyper+N to delete
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::N, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::DELETE

item.name: Control + Command + L to sleep

item.name: Hyper+2 to switch windows app
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::2, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::BACKQUOTE, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
